text:
Bella Lin Founder of GuineaLoft $71,000 monthly revenue Published September 19, 2024 by Niall Doherty A recent video on YouTubeâ€¦
My Amazon Side Hustle Brings In $409K A Year â€” At Age 17â€¦ Description ðŸ‘‡
Bella Lin, 17, is the founder of GuineaLoft , a company that sells products for small pets, including guinea pig cages, bedding, food feeders and water bottles. In 2024, GuineaLoft has brought in an average of $71,000 per month in revenue so far.
She only launched this in 2022, wasnâ€™t happy with the products available for her pet guinea pigs and started building her own.
Given that itâ€™s physical products her profit margin is probably 10-20%, but thatâ€™s still $7-14K per month only two years in ðŸ¤‘
Maybe thereâ€™s an opportunity to do something like this for other pets.
Cats and dogs would be tough, but pet birds and lizards are just as popular as guinea pigs and the market is likely much less competitive.
